detail.description: IOL Chemicals & Pharmaceuticals Ltd is a leading pharmaceutical (APIs) company and is a significant player in the specialty chemicals space. It serves the domestic and export market.[1] It is the largest player of Ibuprofen (pain killer) globally with a world market share of 35%.[2]
